sub_title: An Accomplished and Resourceful Transformation Leader.
summary:
With extensive experience in asset management, corporate audit, petroleum and development engineering, production/maintenance operations, and business development management, I am Rudolph Driessen!
I am recognised for achieving operational excellence in production through implementation of production technology engineering, industrial best practices, HSSE standards, and establishment of collaborative culture.
One of my core expertise is to build, train, and lead diverse teams to create value for stakeholders via role modelling and adaptive risk-based leadership. My successful business delivery history is accredited by leading enterprise-wide psychological safety behaviour / cultural transformation programmes on personal/process safety in collaboration with specialised consultants. I am instrumental in accomplishing set goals via strategic planning / rapport building across multi-disciplinary functions.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Shell International BV', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague, South Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Shell International BV', 'description': 'In my role as GM Process and Implementation Support for Asset Management Excellence – Integrated Asset Improvement:
I direct Asset Management System (AMS) and Project Management Framework (PMF) based Control Framework process and services implementation to global Line of businesses covering Integrated Gas, Deep Water, Upstream and Chemicals and Products O&G Assets.
To facilitate Gap To Potential and Asset performance closure plan implementation programmes, I direct and guide a team of 60 plus Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) covering Production, Maintenance Execution & Planning, Reliability, Turn-Around management, and Well/Reservoir/Facilities (WRFM) Management, Technology Replication Trust and Operations Readiness Assurance/Commissioning  and World Class commissioning Start-up/Ramp up Management (ORA/CSU) in deploying Asset Centric systemic tools/systems, and work process management.
I also play a key role in process effectiveness and assurance verification and in-Asset capability and Project Readiness development and transition.
I deliver guidance to global HSSE Critical Equipment and Human Barrier management change programme, impacting organisationally: people and skills, process, and systems and ways of working.
My key contributions include:
• Accomplished operational excellence via Integrated Production System management (IPSM) deployment, optimisation gains in upstream asset portfolio representing 3-4% of the asset NFA production promise.
• Integrated value delivery programme deployment across LOB averaging 1-3 % improvements in reliability; embedded and deepened in-asset and remote global centre exception-based surveillance / proactive technical monitoring programme, and capability development accomplishing 3+% production deferment avoidance.
• Supported asset centric coach/mentoring schemes as part of capability development, localisation, and process effectiveness sustainability.', 'title': 'GM Production Operations Support', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'SHELL TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO LIMITED', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Trinidad and Tobago', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'SHELL TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO LIMITED', 'description': 'In my role as GM Upstream Manager:
I delivered oversight for production operations along with maintenance/inspection and wells reservoir facility management (WRFM), logistics, asset integrity process safety (AIPS), and integrated strategic/tactical activity planning.
I headed Shell T&T Production and AIPS functional team with over 350 staff personnel for seamless operational activities.
To maintain governance/assurance processes, I fostered relationships with SH partners and technical authorities.
For creation of cultural shift with red matter for safety and model safety leadership programmes,  I improved leadership, safety compliance, and asset performance.
I also played a key role as a member of board of directors for Atlantic liquefied natural gas (ALNG) and Shell T&T specific midstream directorships.
I successfully sustained upstream asset WP&B specific CAPEX/OPEX budgets respectively valued at $15M and $90M.
My key contributions include:
• Received safety recognition award from integrated gas / new energies director.
• Transitioned multi-year stagnant safety performance KPIs, reduced LTIF from over 3.5 to 0.3 along with trend busting TRCF, HIPO incidents, and normalisation of trend statistics.
• Improved profile of building leadership capacity (across Shell T&T and into contracting communities) and behavioural change requirement, which led to reduce incident statistics.
• Led Shell T&T through 2018 earthquake from safe production/operations excellence and recovery perspective.
• Accomplished operational excellence turnaround from bottom to top quartile performance, including up to 30% expat reduction and >95% localisation in upstream asset by 21.
• Received several global operational excellence, WRFM recognition awards, ranked top five in Shell global OPCO ranking table, assessed OE processes as top quartile, and won ‘make it safe’, ‘make it grow’, and ‘make it work’ recognition awards.', 'title': 'GM Upstream Assets Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Salym Petroleum Development NV (Joint Venture', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Moscow, Russian Federation', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Salym Petroleum Development NV (Joint Venture', 'description': 'In my role as Production Director / Asset Manager:
I headed production operations along with maintenance, power management, WRFM, and AIPS. 
I led SPD AIPS functional team and strengthened governance/assurance processes with SH partners and technical authorities.
As a workstream lead, I established cultural shift with incident and injury-free (IIF™) safety approach, also transformed safety leadership and performance.
To ensure uninterrupted operational activities of asset and technical authority support centre, I headed OM functional department with over 450 staff members.
I also administered OM functional WP&B specific CAPEX/OPEX budgets worth $87M and $93M respectively, while leading CI processes UOC targeted (USD/BOE) at benchmarked TQ levels.
My key contributions include:
• Delivered adaptive / conflict-resolution based leadership while maintaining bottom-line performance and AIPS risk exposure while building relationships as foundation for achievements and establishing ‘one team’ culture.
• Championed SPD IIF culture safety change programmes and received safety recognition award.
• Improved stagnant safety KPIs, including LTIF from 1.2 to less than 0.2, TRCF to less than 15%, and trend statistics reductions for HIPO, and LSR violations ranging to >60%.
• Managed crisis and guided SPD export pipeline recovery programme of learnings into wider threat mitigation-based SPD Pipeline-network strategy plan.
• Earned global OE, WRFM recognition awards, achieved top rank in Shell global OPCO ranking table, and assessed various OE processes as top quartile.', 'title': 'Production Director/ Asset Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1271, 'name': 'Shell', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGN30g7aSl4NA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856218579?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=tNZAoMUkdjwkgcqi-h79Em_6eRebVnZdKSDkAOA6QPE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/shell/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': 'In my role as Senior International Auditor for Upstream/Projects & Technology:
I provided assurance to RDS board through risk-based assessment of Shell control framework effectiveness as well as risk management practices.
I served as an SME for OE control framework, AIPS, well, reservoir, and facility management.
To carry out various single/global entity group audits in joint ventures, I collaborated with audit team of eight members.
I also delivered quality control framework insights/feedback and enhanced senior management’s reporting to convert information into improvement actions.
My key contributions include:
• Concluded 10 complex, 3 group notable audits and coordinated over 20 audits, received positive feedback from Auditee.
• Received Special Recognition Awards in 2012 and 2013 for exemplary stakeholder engagement and ability to effectively communicate and engage hierarchical levels of stakeholders: Executive to Peer level.
• Engaged with senior leaders in planning, execution, and conclusion of various global audits across Shell to enhance communication and stakeholder engagement competencies.
• Formulated maintenance reference plan (MRP) template and asset reference planning guide on secondment into global production team.', 'title': 'Senior International Auditor U', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 88597, 'name': 'Bapetco', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHMIf9Yybs_Cw/company-logo_400_400/0/1519888320932?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=F-9ci-lpe5OPcVe4eUjYWunKFeJNvi3UlxZY253Qj-Y', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/bapetco/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Cairo, Egypt', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'Bapetco', 'description': 'In my role as Obaiyed Field Manager:
I supervised daily incident free operations, asset integrity, and delivery of sustainable production volumes.
I oversaw implementation/governance of company systems and production excellence improvement programmes.
I also planned/integrated and executed development growth opportunities while optimising turn-around planning in collaboration with field and extended leadership team.
To facilitate western desert export pipeline routes, I conducted operating/integrity management control.
I provided leadership to nine Bapetco management staff positions for production of 12 MM SCM/day of conditioned gas, 1200M^3/day condensate with annual OPEX valued at $8.5MM, and additional projects with over $20MM.
My key contributions include:
• Designed, planned, and oversaw three week major complex turn-around scope during the aftermath of the Egyptian revolution.
• Steered site operations team in Operating Integrity, expediting alarm management reduction programme, which resulted in reducing alarm rate from 20 to four alarms per operator per hour.
• Drafted business case and incorporated surface pipeline and facility insulation programme and significantly reduced OPEX, transport, operating reliability, and HSSE exposures, also improved operating effectiveness.', 'title': 'Obaiyed Field Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Shell E&P Malaysia', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Malaysia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'Shell E&P Malaysia', 'description': 'In my role as Maintenance Strategy and Planning Lead:
I created and implemented maintenance and engineering strategy along with business improvement and functional activity.
I headed diverse project teams and BI and lean change programmes, including MIE-ME and Asset Integrity, material management BOM recovery programme, and cost transparency programmes.
To support maintenance IAP process and CMMS-SAP transient data, I delivered technical leadership and support to the team.
I also assisted directorship role (1/2008 – 1/2009) for Deepwater Borneo Ltd. – Brunei for non-operated asset governing the JOA and exploration opportunity portfolio.
My key contributions include:
• Incorporate and led Technical Integrity Assurance framework (AIMF) steering committee across SMEP-Malaysia.
• Delivered MIE-ME and MIE-AI programmes towards the journey to ‘Calculative’ status by setting-up the SMEP organisation.
• Implemented Malaysian SMEP M&E re-organization in 2006 with consultancy support from Booz-Allen.
• Transformed MEST team into integrated ‘Value-add’ organisation in wider SMEP maintenance/production operations organisation.
• Concluded operational excellence review in Woodside Karathas (Australia) and Changbei (China).', 'title': 'Maintenance strategy and planning lead', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Shell UK E&P', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Aberdeen, Scotland, United Kingdom', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'company': 'Shell UK E&P', 'description': 'Northern Northsea mature assets ranging from fixed platform, subsea, FPSO oil developments', 'title': 'Wells, Reservoir, Facilities Management lead -
